Name: Jhannet
description:
Jhannet, age 21, is a single mother with one daughter, age 1 year. She lives with her parents because she needs to save everything she can.

She works selling plants, mulch, and soil. She has been in the business for three years, and her best customers are in the community of RÃ­o Abajo.

Jhannet wants a loan to rent a sales space that is in a better location. This will help her to increase her income, because there is great demand for her plants.
